p: The initial air surface warming which occurs due to low latitude deforestation is in agreement with earlier studies [ 12, 24, 53]. The magnitude of the temperature change is not consistent with previous studies due to differences in the location and magnitude of deforested areas and CO 2 concentrations. Our 100% simulation resulted in a 0.04 K global warming by 2100 while previous studies show values ranging from 0.4 K [ 24] to 0.7 K [ 12].
